title: France's Macron makes last-minute appeal to voters as Le Pen reaches all-time high in poll
content:
1. France's Macron makes last-minute appeal to voters as Le Pen reaches all-time high in poll  Reuters
  2. The White House is freaked out that Putin's next big win could be in Paris  POLITICO
  3. French election: Far-right Le Pen closes in on Macron - BBC Newsnight  BBC News
  4. Who might upset Macron's bid for a second term in office?  Reuters
  5. Will the French elections reveal a shift to the right? | Mary Dejevsky  The Independent
contentSnippet:
France's Macron makes last-minute appeal to voters as Le Pen reaches all-time high in poll  Reuters
The White House is freaked out that Putin's next big win could be in Paris  POLITICO
French election: Far-right Le Pen closes in on Macron - BBC Newsnight  BBC News
Who might upset Macron's bid for a second term in office?  Reuters
Will the French elections reveal a shift to the right? | Mary Dejevsky  The Independent

localize.title: フランスのマクロン大統領は、ルペン大統領が世論調査で過去最高を記録する中、有権者に最後のアピールをする。
法国马克龙在最后一刻向选民发出呼吁，因为勒庞的民调达到历史新高
法國馬克龍在最後一刻向選民發出呼籲，因爲勒龐的民調達到歷史新高
